mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(ddr.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS time FROM ${tableName} ddr WHERE del_flag = 0 AND ddr.user_type_id IS NOT NULL AND ali_user_id = #{aliUserId} GROUP BY time ) dailyCount
SELECT is_receive, set_num, ali_user_id,uu_id FROM daily_receiving ddr WHERE del_flag = 0 AND week_ = #{week} AND ali_user_id = #{aliUserId}
